search.place-holder: Enter what you want to find

error.birth-date-future: The birth date cannot be a future date.
error.age-restriction: You must be at least 13 years old to register.
error.birth-date-empty: Please enter a valid birth date.
error.last-name-invalid: Please ensure your last name is between 5 and 50 characters.
error.first-name-invalid: Please ensure your first name is between 5 and 50 characters.
error.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
error.email-exist: The entered email is already registered. Please enter another email.
error.terms-and-conditions-empty: Please accept the terms and conditions.
error.password-web-invalid-length: The password must be greater than 5 characters and less than 30 characters.
error.username-invalid-length: The username must be greater than 5 characters and less than 20 characters.
error.password-game-invalid-length: The password must be greater than 5 characters and less than 30 characters.

finaly-create-account-game.title-server-message: Protect your account and choose a secure password for the game.

account-game.title-server-message: This name will be your public identity. You can change it once for free.

congrats.body-welcome: We warmly welcome you to our community! We're delighted to have you here. You're just one step away from enjoying your favorite games for free. Finish creating your game account and start playing now!
congrats.disclaimer: We guarantee the complete security of your data, and you retain full control over your information. If you decide to unsubscribe at any time, we will completely delete all your data from our system.

register.title-server-message: All the information you share with us at Wow Libre is like the special ingredient of your amazing experience! The more we know, the better we can make you experience something truly extraordinary. So, share those details with us and get ready for something out of this world!

kown-you.title-server-message: Your real name may be used in the future to verify your identity when contacting WowLibre. By default, your real name will remain hidden from other users.

contact-means.title-server-message: This is what you'll use when logging into websites and mobile apps.

terms-and-conditions.title-server-message: Welcome to Wow Libre! Accepting our options allows you to immerse yourself in a personalized experience full of exclusive offers, exciting news, and much more.

input.email-check-text: The account email will receive special offers, news, and more from Wow Libre
input.term-check-text: I have read and accept the following: Terms and Conditions

account-web.title-server-message: Protect your account and choose a secure password for the administrative web.

error.empty-field-message: Please fill in all required fields to continue
error.authentication-message: The data is invalid, please check your information

service-unavailable.message: It is not possible to obtain the details of your accounts at this time, please wait.

service-available.txt-message: Manage and administer World of Warcraft accounts efficiently and securely.

message.expiration-session: Oops! Your session has expired. Please authenticate again to continue.
